title: 02/17/2021 – Hour 1 – What Is The Best Landing Spot For J.J. Watt? Guest – Adam Caplan
itunes:title: 02/17/2021 – Hour 1 – What Is The Best Landing Spot For J.J. Watt? Guest – Adam Caplan
description:
LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress sit in for Dan Patrick and question if joining Tom Brady and the Tampa Bay Buccaneers is the best option for J.J. Watt now that he is a free agent. The guys debate whether or not Trevor Lawrence can live up to the hype that has been placed upon him. Plus, Fox Sports Radio NFL insider Adam Caplan stops by to weigh in on the biggest moves of the offseason! 


Subscribe, rate and review Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress. Listen to the show LIVE on Fox Sports Radio Saturdays 1-3pm ET!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/up-on-game/id1542652485

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
